overview: When a spoiled-rotten cutie-pie is left home alone with a pile of canceled credit cards and no cash, she does what any enterprising young lady would do - she goes to Daddy's loaded friend and barters her bodacious booty for a big wad of bills! The foxy teen tycoon's slutty friends soon join her booming business-for-pleasure, and the profits go straight up. So will you.
tagline: Blow. Bang. Come. Collect. That's How We Do It In the Big City.
title: Barely Legal in the City
